what_worked: Applied or_to_union, intersect_to_exists, decorrelate: Decorrelated the color filter subquery by moving it to a CTE, created filtered CTEs for date and address dimensions, and converted implicit joins to explicit JOIN syntax.
why_it_worked: Converting OR to UNION ALL lets optimizer choose independent index paths per branch; Replacing INTERSECT with EXISTS avoids materializing full intermediate sets; Correlated subqueries re-execute per outer row; converting to JOIN eliminates per-row overhead
